title: Naturopathic Doctors San Diego | Naturopathic Rx San Diego

cleaned_text: We Are Your Prescription for Health Naturopathic Rx San Diego San Diego Naturopathic Doctor Services Naturopathic Medical Care specific health goals. Hormone Therapy Bioidentical hormones are derived from plants; they are natural, safe, and effective. Bioidentical hormone replacement therapy has been the subject of several clinical studies and found to be the preferred method of hormone replacement therapy (HRT). IV Nutrient Therapy IV nutrients are delivered immediately with 100% absorption. Each formula is prepared with a specific therapeutic purpose by our Naturopathic Doctors in San Diego. Vitamin Injections A fast and easy option to increase your nutrients status. The injections performed are specifically formulated with efficacy and intention. PRP & Exosome Microneedling for Anti-Aging A powerful anti-aging procedure that decreases fine lines & wrinkles, while improving skin texture via collagen induction therapy which can provide you with a youthful appearance. PRP & Exosome Injections for Hair Restoration Treatments with growth factor injections & microneedling work to stimulate new hair growth for an enhanced/ thickened natural hairline. Laboratory Services Blood draws, various specimen collection, and in-house labs offered to our new, established, and acute care patients.
